tool.name: Boxplot [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Create a boxplot visualization of the features in the analysis dataset.
tool.command:
set -eu && export GALAXY_OUTPUTS_SPEC='{"DataFrames": "dataframe_folder", "figures": "figure_folder"}' &&
## Debug: Show params.json echo "=== params.json ===" >&2 && cat "$params_json" >&2 && echo "==================" >&2 &&
## Save snapshot cp "$params_json" params_snapshot.json &&
## Run wrapper bash $__tool_directory__/run_spac_template.sh "$params_json" "boxplot"

param.name: Upstream_Analysis
param.label: Upstream Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: Table_to_Visualize
param.label: Table to Visualize
param.help: Source table to perform the visualization. Default is Original, referring to the raw dataset.

param.name: Feature_s_to_Plot
param.label: Feature(s) to Plot
param.help: The feature(s) to plot in the box plot. Default "All" will plot all features. (Enter as comma-separated list or one per line)

param.name: Primary_Annotation
param.label: Primary Annotation
param.help: The annotation to group the visualizations. Use "None" to disable.

param.name: Secondary_Annotation
param.label: Secondary Annotation
param.help: Secondary annotation to create subdivisions within each category defined by the primary annotation, offering a deeper level of analysis, such as comparing time points within each treatment condition. Default is "None".

param.name: Value_Axis_Log_Scale
param.label: Value Axis Log Scale
param.help: Make the Y-axis (or X-axis if the plot is horizontal) in log scale. Negative values in the data disable the log scale.

param.name: Horizontal_Plot
param.label: Horizontal Plot
param.help: To plot the boxplot in horizontal orientation. Default is vertical.

param.name: Figure_DPI
param.label: Figure DPI
param.help: Higher the DPI, clearer the image.

param.name: Keep_Outliers
param.label: Keep Outliers
param.help: True to keep the outliers for every feature, False to remove them

tool.help:
**Boxplot [SPAC] [DMAP]**
Create a boxplot visualization of the features in the analysis dataset. Please refer to , [GitHub Documentation](https://fnlcr-dmap.github.io/SCSAWorkflow/spac.html#spac.visualization.boxplot)
This tool is part of the SPAC (SPAtial single-Cell analysis) toolkit.
**List Parameters:** Use comma-separated values or one per line. **Special Values:** Enter "All" to select all items.
